name: Time Tracker

enable-button.name: Enable Button
enable-button.description: Enbables the button on the left menu, allowing you to see your playtime

hhmmss-time-format.name: Hours, minutes, seconds format
hhmmss-time-format.description:
Shows time played in hours, minutes, and seconds, such as in the format
'Time played: 12 hours, 34 minutes, 56 seconds'
Both settings can be selected at the same time

hours-only-time-format.name: Hours format
hours-only-time-format.description:
Shows time played in hours, such as in the format
'Time played: 3.14 hours'
Both settings can be selected at the same time

time-with-paused.name: Total play time format
time-with-paused.description:
Show a time format with the time paused included
Both settings can be selected at the same time

time-without-paused.name: Excluding paused time format
time-without-paused.description:
Show a time format with the time paused excluded
Both settings can be selected at the same time

description: Tracks your time played in each level
